Title: Programmers Calculator
Description: Programmers calculator is a simple win form application for programmers.The main feature of the application are as below.
HomeWiki:
Project Description



Programmers calculator is a simple win form application for programmers.Key features of Programmers Calculator are:

  1. Free and very lightweight: less than a megabyte in size, works fast
  2. Allows you to calculate MD5, SHA1, SHA256, SHA512 of text and files
  3. Text to binary conversion: converts text to binary (String to Bit)
  4. Hex editor: you can open up and view hex values of files
  5. Unicode text size calculator: calculates size of Unicode text in bits
  6. Text to Base64 conversion: allows you to convert text string to base64
  7. Number conversion
